participant_1.background:
I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends.
I like the weather when it's warm enough to walk on the beach, but not so warm that I get too hot.
I am passionate and determined, even when faced with difficulties.
I am a self-motivated and reliable worker who is looking for a position where I can use my skills and experience to make a positive impact on the company.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

participant_2.background:
I am a free spirit, and I live my life according to my own rules.
I am ready to work, but my car is not.
i love to workout.
i am married with three kids.
I care a lot about social media because I love to share my experiences with others and get feedback.

content.text: I'm good! Just got back from a workout. How about you?
I'm doing well! I'm just about to go for a walk with my dog.
Oh nice! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy.
Golden retrievers are the best! I used to have one named Bailey.
I agree! They're so sweet and loving.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to the beach, read, and spend time with my family.
I love the beach too! What's your favorite thing to do there?
I love to swim, sunbathe, and build sand castles.
Those are all great activities! I love to swim and build sand castles too.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
We do! It's nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
Me too! Maybe we can hang out sometime and do some of these things together.
I would love that! I'm free this weekend.
Great! I'll DM you my number.
